oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The “New Extensionist”: Roles, Strategies, and Capacities to Strengthen Extension and Advisory Services
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: R. Sulaiman
K. Davis
oai_dc:dc.Publisher: Global Forum for Rural Advisory Services (GFRAS)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Extension and advisory services (EAS) 1 play an important role in agricultural development. However, these services need new capacities to address the current challenges in agriculture and to contribute better to agricultural innovation – a process that that requires interactions and knowledge flows among a wide range of actors in the agricultural innovation system (AIS).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: innovation systems
is extension
